com.mojang.serialization

Interface Codec.ResultFunction<A>

  • Type Parameters:
    A - The type this operator transforms.
    Enclosing interface:
    Codec<A>

    public static interface Codec.ResultFunction<A>
    A unary operator applied on the result obtained from decoding or encoding. This can be used to directly transform the DataResult returned from decoding and encoding methods, rather than the wrapped result.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> DataResult<Pair<A,T>> apply(DynamicOps<T> ops, T input, DataResult<Pair<A,T>> a)
      Applies a transformation to the result of decoding an object a.
      <T> DataResult<T> coApply(DynamicOps<T> ops, A input, DataResult<T> t)
      Applies a transformation to the result of encoding an object.

    • Method Detail

      • apply

        <T> DataResult<Pair<A,T>> apply(DynamicOps<T> ops,
                                T input,
                                DataResult<Pair<A,T>> a)
        Applies a transformation to the result of decoding an object a. This transformation may read more input from the serialized form, or transform successes into errors and visa-versa.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the serialized form.
        Parameters:
        ops - The DynamicOps instance defining the serialized form.
        input - The original input to Decoder.decode(Dynamic).
        a - The result obtained from Decoder.decode(Dynamic).
        Returns:
        The transformed DataResult.

      • coApply

        <T> DataResult<T> coApply(DynamicOps<T> ops,
                          A input,
                          DataResult<T> t)
        Applies a transformation to the result of encoding an object. This transformation may serialize additional data from the input object, or transform successes into errors and visa-versa.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the serialized form.
        Parameters:
        ops - The DynamicOps instance defining the serialized form.
        input - The original input to Encoder.encode(Object, DynamicOps, Object).
        t - the result obtained from Encoder.encode(Object, DynamicOps, Object).
        Returns:
        The transformed DataResult.
